Seleccionar una opción de entre las que han sido propuestas por el chatbot.

description: TFM: asistente conversacional para frigorífico inteligente

values: You have not provided the dish name you want to cook, I'll find something delicious for you, give me a second.
Try again, please provide the dish to get the recipe
I can take your recipe request. Please, tell me the dish name or show me a picture of the dish you want
I will not allow more offensive comments :rage: :anger: :boom:
You have not provided specific ingredients or cuisine type. Don`t worry, leave it in my hands. I'll look for something delicious for you :yum:. Give me a second...
Try again, provide cuisine type or ingredients
Well, Leave it in my hands, I'll look for something delicious for you :yum:. Give me a second...
I`ve catched you want to use the following ingredients: $ingredients. Now, tell me, do you have any food intolerance?
I have catched the cuisine type chosen is $cuisine_type. Now, tell me, do you have any food intolerance?
Let me a second, I'm going to check if you have $ingredients
Let me get a ingredients summary for you

output.text: Please, provide a valid option from 1 to 6

values: I can take your recipe request. Please, tell me the dish name or show me a picture of the dish you want.
:ok_hand:  Good choice! I'll find the $dish recipe for you, give me a second :hourglass_flowing_sand:
Tell me, do you have any food intolerance?
Don`t worry about the intolerances. I'll look for something delicious for you :yum:. Give me a second...
Please, try one last time, do you have any food intolerances? For example: gluten, dairy, yeast...
:ok_hand:  Good choice! I'll look for something delicious for you :yum:. Give me a second :hourglass_flowing_sand:
:ok_hand:  Good choice! I'll look for something delicious for you :yum:. Give me a second :hourglass_flowing_sand:

output.text: Please, provide a valid option from 1 to 6

values: Do you have any preference regarding the ingredients or the type of cooking?

dialog_nodes.title: check ingredients / cuisine type (included in the request)
ask for cuisine_type or ingredients (one last time)

values: Sorry, you have not provided a valid type of cooking (ie. mexican, french, etc.) or ingredients (ie. chicken and onion). Please, try one last time.
Ok, I have catched the ingredients chosen as $ingredients. Please, now tell if you have any food intolerance.
Don't worry about the ingredients or the cuisine type, I will look for something delicious for you.
Ok, I 've catched the type of cuisine chosen is $cuisine_type. Please, now tell if you have any food intolerance.
Ok, good! I will search the most popular recipe with "*$cuisine_type $ingredients*".
Do you have any preference regarding the ingredients or the type of cooking?
Ok, good! I will search the most popular recipe with "*$cuisine_type $ingredients*".
Now, tell me, do you have any food intolerance?

output.text: Please, provide the ingredients. The type of cuisine is...
Please, provide a valid option from 1 to 6
Please, provide the ingredients. The type of cuisine is...

dialog_nodes.title: ask for the cuisine type and the ingredients

values: Please, provide the type of cooking (i.e. mexican, french, etc.) or the ingredients to use.

Tell me, do you have any food intolerance?
